examples.example: 许多优秀的企业为社会的发展做出了巨大贡献。

translate.english: Many excellent enterprises have made great contributions to the development of society.

examples.example: 众多充满活力的企业给人们的生活带来了极大便利。

translate.english: A large number of vibrant enterprises have brought great convenience to people's lives.

examples.example: 成功的企业总是不断创新，积极回馈社会，为大家带来美好与希望。

translate.english: Successful enterprises always keep innovating continuously, actively give back to the society, and bring beauty and hope to everyone.
